original: It wouldn't be so bad, except for the sudden stop at the end.__Next time, don't get so close to the edge.
You never did care for fondue.__Next time, don't get so close to the edge.
You may not be Purina Rat Chow, but you'll do!
A quick, but painful, way to shed those extra inches.
Your radar is designed to avoid just such an occurrence.
One Way to Lower Your Blood Pressure.
A brave but fatal attempt at arterial art.
You have demonstrated a surprising lack of janitorial skill.__Perhaps this would be an opportune time to `brush up' on your technique with Space Quest I and II.
You have taken the big plunge.
That's one small step for man... One giant leap for janitor-kind.
It's so hot you could fry a Vorlian phlegmsnake egg.
Don't Trust Guys in Black Spacesuits
A pulselaser blast to the forehead is not your idea of fun.__Fortunately, it didn't hit anything important.
Better hang out at the gym more often.
Hope you enjoy your new flow-through ventilation system.
Just Like Mom Used to Make
As your life sputters to a close, you decide to cut down on desserts.
Didn't mom always tell you not to play with firecrackers?
Thanks for playing Space Quest ]I[. As usual, you've been a real hoot.

הערות: שלושת אלה זה האפשרויות אחרי שמתים

original: You are still carrying the piece of orium you picked up on Labion during your last adventure. However, it has long since lost its glow.
הערות: חשוב מאד! מכאן ולמטה, זה ה inventory

original: It's a piece of SQ-approved electrical wire.
This is a ladder. The evenly spaced rungs allow altitude adjustment.
Orat on a Stick! You can open his mouth, and close his mouth! Hours of fun for all!
ThermoWeave Shorts.__They keep you cool, and they're oh, so stylish.
Wow! Your Official Astro Chicken Flight Hat!__Man, the babes'll really dig you in this!
With this ring, you can decode any secret message!__Well, almost any secret message.
Used for blowing stuff to little bits.___It has an impact switch, so in other words...DON'T DROP IT!
Elmo Pug's personal keycard for opening locked doors.
A pair of janitor's coveralls. Used for looking the part.
Mr. Garbage: a janitor's best friend. Designed to vaporize all nonorganic biodegradable matter (i.e. trash).
A fine likeness of Elmo Pug's mug. Elmo Pug is the dashing young owner of ScumSoft, Inc.
A fine likeness of a likeness of Elmo Pug's mug.
A bag chock-full of gastric delights!

It has been an indeterminate amount
of time since Roger Wilco rocketed
away from Vohaul's burning space
fortress. Time stands still for our
hero in suspended animation.
translation:
פרק זמן בלתי מוגדר חלף עבר
מאז שרוג'ר ווילקו נסק אל על
ממבצר החלל הבוער של וואהל.
שנותיו של גיבורנו עברו עליו בנעימים
כשהוא שרוי במצב של הקפאה קריוגנית.
הערות:
צריך אחידות בתרגום של Vohaul.
השווה 'טקסטים של כל החדרים' חדר 2 הודעה 5

original:
Its engines long spent, the small
escape pod drifts aimlessly through
unfamiliar star fields, its course
altered many times by small asteroids
and space debris. Inside, Roger lies
undisturbed in his sleep chamber....
...but not for long.
translation:
כשמנועיה כבו זה מכבר,
חללית המילוט הקטנה נסחפה ללא מטרה
מבעד לשדות כוכבים בלתי מוכרים
מסלולה משתנה ללא הרף על ידי אסטרואידים קטנים
ופסולת חלל. בפנים, שוכב לו רוג'ר בתאו
שקוע בתרדמת עמוקה... אך... לא לעולם חוסן.

You enter a blackness like no other you\nhave ever experienced. All sense of time\nand speed are lost.

A bright light becomes visible in the
distance. It grows larger as your ship
races toward it. Finally you are hurled
out of the blackness into a parallel universe.
Looking closely, you notice that the terminator's invisibility belt has survived relatively intact.
Looking closely, you notice that the terminator's invisibility belt has survived relatively intact.
Looking closely, you notice that the terminator's invisibility belt has survived relatively intact.
Looking closely, you notice that the terminator's invisibility belt has survived relatively intact.

The overwhelming force of the black hole
draws your ship in. Helpless to do any-
thing, you and your passengers strap in
and hope for the best.
